data.name: Stealth Kart Demo
data.detailed_description:
Stealth Kart is Racing plus Real-Time Tactics. Enjoy the classic thrill of sneaking past enemies, but this time in a few minutes per level. Or race past everyone. Play alone, or coordinate special cars alone, or play coop.

This demo is a ~15 minute experience, showcasing the unique gameplay. There are three distinct cars to play with, and you can play local coop with up to three people, if you want. There is a boss fight in the end, and there are crazy levels to unlock based on your playstyle.

The full version will be this times ten, with many more levels. Given enough interest for this demo, there will be a fourth player character - allowing four player coop - and even a Versus mode. Have fun!
